short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces all instances of the word 'Spotify' with the word 'Memestream' in your web browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A silly Chrome extension used to replace all instances of the word "Spotify" with the word "Memestream" in your web browser, because Spotify is a meme of a streaming platform.
